p: (1) Method 1. Orpiment is steamed (Swedana) followed by submerging the drug in liquid media for a whole night and during day time it is to be dried under sun light (Bhavana) or both [ 45]. The liquids like Tilaksarajala, Salmali mula Kwatha, lime juice, and Balamula Kwatha are also used by one or two Acharyas for the purification of orpiment either for Swedana or Bhavana. Swedana-Haritala churna should be kept in a pottali and this pottali should be placed in dolayantra containing various types of liquids. The dolayantra should be subjected to fire for given time [ 46].
